data.description:
Blackjack Bailey VR is a single player virtual reality blackjack game that offers the thrill of playing 21 in a casino.  It features a cute and charismatic female dealer that goes by the name of Bailey, who secretly wants you to win.
Practice makes Perfect! The odds are in your favor because you have access to an unlimited bank and there are no in-app purchases so you never have to buy chips to keep playing. Once downloaded you can play forever.
Virtual Vegas Baby!  You play seated at a 21 table just like youâ€™re at a real Casino.  This Virtual reality blackjack game is a one of a kind experience that you play on your Samsung gear VR headset. All the thrills of a Vegas Casino but none of the risk. Enjoy playing 21 anytime, anywhere.

Join the winner's circle and play Blackjack Bailey today!

Features:
+ Fully immersive VR Blackjack
+ Cute and Charismatic dealer
+ Unlimited Bankroll, play forever
+ Oversized cards, HD graphics
+ Las Vegas Casino house rules

changelog.change_log:
+ Adjusted the camera position and orientation
+ Adjusted the scene lighting
+ Adjusted the graphic settings to be better
+ Head and eye tracking to follow player
+ Eye blinks and nuances
+ Added"security" animation and VO when game ends
+ Added game over VO and sound FX
+ Fixed a bug where dealer was announcing a bust on soft cards
+ Fixed a bug where dealer was announcing a false blackjack
+ Fixed a bug where split was working only intermittently
+ Fixed a bug where the dealer would simply stop dealing
+ Fixed a bug where the dealer would say "busted" when it wasn't a bust.
+ Fixed a bug where the character wasn't being paid out properly for winning
+ Fixed a bug where the music would stop after the first loop
+ Various other minor fixes and optimisations
